meanings.definition: A type of crustacean with a calcareous shell
meanings.sent1: The cirripeds attached themselves to the rocks along the shore.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the cirripeds to learn more about their habitat.
meanings.sent3: The cirripeds decided to have a shell decorating contest.
meanings.sent4: The cirripeds stood out like tiny armored knights on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent5: The children were fascinated by the cirripeds' intricate shells.
